feed.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3

entry.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3
entry.summary: Matt Corallo, a Bitcoin developer, has announced that Wallet Encryption is now in a pull-able state. He posted an update on the Github repository, stating that the code has been rebased onto the wallet class and is ready for "wtf is this crap" messages. The update provides a link to the relevant pull request, as well as a signature.asc file with a digital signature. Matt requested final comments or ACKs from other developers before proceeding with the merge.
